areasOfExpertiseCircles.quote: Our seasoned track record and extensive expertise makes us your go-to partner for a variety of needs.

performanceSection.description1: Through milestones and measurable results and achievements, our
performanceSection.description2: success story is told by the numbers.

projectsSection.description: Explore a glimpse of our significant projects.

clientsSection.trustedBy: Trusted by industry leaders, our valued clients include…

enviromentalSection.diversityDescription: With a footprint spanning over 21 countries, our collaborative efforts with governments and local enterprises have made us realize the profound impact we can have beyond our core competencies. We came to understand where and how we can truly make a difference by giving back to the communities we serve, and enrich their lives across diverse segments. From championing environmental causes to advancing educational initiatives, we address the unique challenges faced by each community we serve. Over the years, we've spearheaded more than 100 programs, touching the lives of thousands while and foster positive change. Yet, our journey is far from over – we're committed to continuing this path of making meaningful change wherever we are.

reachSection.description: With headquarters in both Dubai and Beirut, we have expanded to 21 countries across the Middle East and Africa, where we provide our expertise in a comprehensive coverage.

projects.description: Explore our extensive expertise through a glimpse of pur projects. Each of which highlight our solution-centric approach that has enabled us to set benchmarks within the industry.

leadership.founderDescription1: BUTEC, established over 60 years ago, has overcome challenges such as Lebanon’s civil war and current regional turmoil. Passing the leadership to Chairman Ziad Younes, I am confident in the company’s continued success. My focus now turns to Lebanon’s societal unity and the pursuit of a democratic civil state. Despite the difficulty of leaving my cherished career, I am compelled to contribute to national issues. I encourage your commitment to values and ethics, emphasising the significance of your achievements in Lebanon’s struggle. I remain devoted to your endeavours and the vision of an “Other Lebanon.”
leadership.chairmanDescription1: BUTEC, or “Bureau Technique d’Etudes et de Construction,” began as an innovative EPC contractor over 60 years ago. The company values the potential of its workforce, emphasizing innovation and improvement. Committed to fulfilling contractual obligations globally, BUTEC combines the cost structure of a local contractor with the technical expertise of an international one. Despite its growth, the company has preserved a family- oriented culture. As chairman since 2015, I am proud of our achievements and look forward to the next phase of growth. In these uncertain times, preserving BUTEC’s tradition of dynamic yet careful movement is crucial for continued success. I rely on each team member to contribute to the exciting journey ahead.
leadership.managementDescription: BUTEC’s integrated management system (IMS) combines the company’s three separate quality, environment, and occupational health and safety management systems into one, thus reducing bureaucracy and ensuring greater efficiency. The IMS defines how the firm’s activities are conducted and ensures that the relevant procedures and documentation are in place to satisfy the criteria of BUTEC’s awarded certification in Quality Management Systems (ISO 9001), Environment Management Systems (ISO 14001), and Occupational Health and Safety Assessment Series (ISO 45001).
leadership.qualityDescription: BUTEC’s success and growth are a direct result of the company’s emphasis on quality across all of its activities. BUTEC is committed to safeguarding the environment on project sites while equally prioritizing the health and safety of the workforce. This commitment is emphasized by regularly allocating necessary resources to mitigate potential risks or hazards, all while ensuring the well-being of all stakeholders, including suppliers, clients, supervisors, and other involved parties. Although the diversified nature of undertaken projects dictates varying QHSE requirements, BUTEC rises to the challenge, successfully adapting to each project’s needs, a fact evidenced by the company’s various certifications. All of this is successfully navigated while achieving sustainable growth.
leadership.diversityDescription: BUTEC nurtures a growth-oriented, professional work environment that aims to promote personal success as well as career satisfaction. Diversity and inclusion at BUTEC are key corporate initiatives. We believe in recruiting and retaining employees from a wide range of cultures and backgrounds, as well as fostering a supportive, positive, ethical work environment that is represented through our codes of conduct and ethics. We value our people, nurture their development, and ensure that all our employees have equal opportunities for success and are treated with dignity and respect. BUTEC’s key focus on diversity allows us to shape a culture where employees are inspired to share their passion, talents, and ideas. Encouraging our employees’ passion for our business ultimately allows for success in our industry. Diversity is a vital component of building a winning and engaging culture where all employees contribute their best work.
leadership.sustainabilityDescription: BUTEC frequently monitors its processes and operations to ensure that we are always adhering to health, safety, environmental, and quality standards as well as regulatory changes. We believe in following sustainable business practices by setting high health and safety standards, improving the environment, and achieving high client satisfaction while operating in accordance with the acquired ISO standards.
leadership.socialResponsibiltiesDescription: With a footprint spanning over 21 countries, our collaborative efforts with governments and local enterprises have made us realize the profound impact we can have beyond our core competencies. We came to understand where and how we can truly make a difference by giving back to the communities we serve, and enrich their lives across diverse segments. From championing environmental causes to advancing educational initiatives, we address the unique challenges faced by each community we serve. Over the years, we've spearheaded more than 100 programs, touching the lives of thousands while and foster positive change. Yet, our journey is far from over – we're committed to continuing this path of making meaningful change wherever we are.

story.journeyDescription1: BUTEC’s track record began in Beirut in 1964. Since the early days, it has evolved from a local engineering company, into a prestigious regional corporation specializing in four areas of expertise: Engineering & Contracting, Electro-Mechanical Solutions, Facility Services, and Utility Services.
story.structureDescription1: Our shareholding structure, blending entrepreneurial ownership (by family and employees) with institutional backing (by IFC, a part of the
story.structureDescription3: ), offers our corporation a unique, dynamic, and responsive organization, that meets the highest governance standard.
story.sectorsDescription: Both public and private sectors can benefit from BUTEC comprehensive solutions in power, water, environmental, oil and gas, infrastructure, and diverse industrial projects.
story.geographicalDescription: These innovative solutions rely on the latest technologies that our people acquired and nurtured throughout the years, and which are enhanced in our design offices and by our execution teams. During the full process, and while implementing our solutions, we make sure to adhere faithfully to the business best practices, environmental respect, health & safety measures, and ethics towards all stakeholders.
story.operationDescription: Operating from our headquarters in both Dubai and Beirut, BUTEC has expanded its
story.operationDescription3: across the Middle East and Africa. In this diverse geographical footprint, we are well aware that our greatest asset remains our
story.operationDescription4: 7,500 skilled, dedicated, and professional multicultural collaborators
story.operationDescription5: who embody the rich culture of our Group
story.relationshipsDescription: Part of our success in this technical and geographical diverse environment, is due to the company’s culture of building strong relationships based on loyalty and professionalism with local and international renowned partners. We strive to earn their trust through proficiency and fruitful complementarities.
story.futureDescription1: Since the beginning, BUTEC has been driven by adaptability, diversity, resilience, and innovation with a clear objective in sight: Creating a greater future in everything we do.
story.futureDescription2: Creating a greater future in everything we do.
story.interationalFinance: The International Finance Corporation (IFC), a member of the World Bank Group, became an
story.edl: with the first Electricity Distribution contract for EDL Lebanon.
story.newHeadquarter: Inauguration of the new headquarters in
story.companiesInAfrica: through the acquisition of 17 specialized Engie companies in Africa.
story.WaterEfficiency: expertise, with the acquisition of Eaux de Marseille Maroc

whyChooseUs.missionDescription: To inspire and positively shape the future through innovative sustainable solutions.
whyChooseUs.visionDescription: Continue our dedication to providing all-inclusive, innovative, sustainable and dependable solutions for our clients; while fostering fulfilling careers for our people and improving the communities we work in.

news.description: Making headlines with our corporate achievements and industry insights.

lifeAtButec.lifeDescription: At BUTEC we thrive on the dynamic growth and evolving careers of our people. At our core, we value great talent who share the same passion to overcome challenges and create impactful solutions. As is the nature of our business, we are exposed to different markets, so we adapt to changing conditions, we are versatile and most importantly we learn from our variety of projects.
lifeAtButec.ourPeopleDescription: BUTEC boasts a workforce of 7,500 dedicated professional across 21 countries. Our corporate culture  is founded on loyalty, teamwork and a persistent commitment to excellence.
lifeAtButec.diversityDescription: Embracing diversity is integral to our ethos at BUTEC. We foster an inclusive workforce that celebrates various cultures and beliefs, recognizing that diversity fuels creativity, enriches our work environment, and drives greater achievements.
lifeAtButec.corporateDescription: From day one, we immerse newcomers in our culture and core values, instilling a commitment to excellence. Our focus on career development includes providing challenging opportunities, exposure, and the tools needed for continuous learning. Investing in our people’s development is the essence of our success.
lifeAtButec.careerDescription: In line with our commitment to excellence, BUTEC invests in human capital, providing the essential tools to optimize learning and growth. Our employees benefit from challenging opportunities and exposure, expanding their knowledge and enhancing expertise. We firmly believe that investing in people’s development is the essence of our success.
lifeAtButec.ourEmployeeDescription: Building a career at BUTEC starts with an open mindset, flexibility, and resilience. Every employee is a pioneer, exploring new work territories with top clients. We thrive on growth, evolve careers, and foster a friendly atmosphere where every voice is heard and valued.
lifeAtButec.dynamismDescription: BUTEC thrives on the dynamism of growth, evolving careers and creating a better version of our work and ourselves.
lifeAtButec.friendlyDescription: In a corporate world, BUTEC is a family where every employee is valued, every voice is heard, and every door remains open.
lifeAtButec.exposureDescription: We embrace versatility, navigate different markets, and live for the love of new challenges, always rekindling our passion to learn.
lifeAtButec.hiringDescription: BUTEC seeks talented individuals with great potential to contribute to our dynamic team.
lifeAtButec.equalEmploymentDescription: Dedicated to equality, BUTEC provides opportunities based on merit, qualifications, and abilities, regardless of race, color, gender, age, religion, nationality, disability, or marital status.
lifeAtButec.applyDescription: Interested candidates can fill out an application form and attach their CV at any time. Data will be incorporated into our database in line with our Privacy Policy. CVs matching the role profile will be selected, and candidates will be contacted by our recruitment team.

butecAcademy.butecAcademyDescription: In our commitment to excel in developing and managing great projects, we recognize the need to develop and manage great talent as well. As a result, we initiated the BUTEC Academy, a group-wide initiative aimed to drive excellence, foster the growth of our people and reinforce our culture. Most importantly it enables us to put together the best teams by nurturing the best talent in all locations.

butecAcademyGoals.butecAcademyGoalsSummary: The academy is driven by several key objectives. These include harnessing BUTEC knowledge and expertise to seed the BUTEC way, elevating internal capabilities by enhancing technical and behavioral competencies,
butecAcademyGoals.knowledge: streamlining onboarding experiences for newcomers, boosting employees' efficiency in their current roles or during transitions between job roles, and laying a solid foundation to facilitate career progression.
butecAcademyGoals.capacity: This is achieved through training modules that were meticulously developed by our Subject Matter Experts in conjunction with our learning team. To date, more than 30 technical training modules have been designed and delivered as interactive, in-person, and virtual training programs that adhere to international learning standards.

butecAcademy.trainingModules: As we reflect on our journey, it is evident that the BUTEC Academy has become a cornerstone in our pursuit of knowledge and skills development. It plays a vital role in developing our people and building a learning culture that translates into great success for both BUTEC and our people.
butecAcademy.joinOurRanks: Would you like to join our team?

contact.rightChannel: Be as specific as possible, including dates, names, and any relevant information that will help us understand and address your complaint effectively.
contact.name: Name
contact.countryCode: Including country code, no spaces or separators

policy.policyApplies: This Privacy Policy applies to all personal information collected by BUTEC via the website located at www.butec.com.

personalInformation.privacyAct: The Privacy Act 1988 (Cth) currently defines “personal information” as meaning information or an opinion about an identified individual or an individual who is reasonably identifiable:
personalInformation.opinionTrueOrNot: whether the information or opinion is true or not; and
personalInformation.opinionRecorded: whether the information or opinion is recorded in a material form or not.
personalInformation.informationClassification: If the information does not disclose your identity or enable your identity to be ascertained, it will in most cases not be classified as “personal information” and will not be subject to this privacy policy.

informationCollection.websiteUse: The kind of personal information that we collect from you will depend on how you use the website. The personal information which we collect and hold about you may include: name, phone number, email address.
